items.title: South Sudan leader sacks powerful vice-president in shock move
items.description: Bol Mel, who is sanctioned by the US for alleged corruption, had been tipped as Kiir's successor.

items.title: PC gaming giant Valve unveils new console to rival Xbox and PlayStation
items.description: The Steam Machine is a console designed to allow gamers to play PC games on their TV.

items.title: Over 200 Kenyans fighting for Russia in Ukraine - minister
items.description: Russian recruitment networks are targeting Kenyans with fake job offers, authorities say.

items.title: France remembers Bataclan attacks but knows enemy has not gone away
items.description: As France marks 10 years since the Paris attacks, an ex-girlfriend of a jihadist survivor is arrested for an alleged plot of her own.

items.title: Anthony Zurcher: Democrats left bruised after historic shutdown yields little
items.description: Trump emerges from the shutdown having made little in the way of substantive concessions to Democrats in Congress.
